content.p: As a student in the School of English there will be lots of information to keep track of throughout your course. This page contains all the links to where you can find information throughout your degree. Every student has access to a Student Hub which is the place to go for all information about your course. Your hub will update throughtout the year with updates and announcements, and is also the home for resources and key information to help support you through your degree. Taught students can find their Student Hubs on Moodle. Research students will find their Student Hub on Sharepoint. Autumn exams: Monday 13 January 2025 - Saturday 25 January 2025 Spring exams: Monday 19 May 2025 - Saturday 7 June 2025 Trent Building The University of Nottingham University Park, Nottingham NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5900 email: english-enquiries@nottingham.ac.uk
